wikipedia_page.main: Clara Torr (1868–1934) was a British music hall comedian.

response: Torr married John Wood's daughter, Elizabeth, with whom he had four children: Annie, Clara, Emma and Sam. Clara Torr (1868 - 1934) would follow in her father's footsteps as a music hall performer as well as being an accomplished pianist in her own right. After Elizabeth died, Torr married for a second time and had a further four children.
